title: Ticket #3736: ssh-to-job test must conserve path length
description:
The (new) Debian 7 machine, possibly among others, fails the ssh-to-job test because the path to the named socket is more than 108 characters. (See line about line 300 in ssh_to_job.cpp.) This shouldn't be too hard to change -- just changing 'temporary' to 'tmp' would fix the problem as observed in run ID 143793:

http://submit-2.batlab.org//nmi-runs/condorauto/2013/07/condorauto_submit-2.batlab.org_1372767001_18130/userdir/nmi:x86_64_Debian7/cmd_ssh_to_job_van-1.out
